title: The Funniest Pranks for Pranksters of All Ages

steps.title: Stuck Hand Sanitizer Prank
steps.content: Stuck Hand Sanitizer Prank Empty a bottle of hand sanitizer. Then, fill the bottle with a clear school glue . Leave the bottle open overnight so the glue dries. In the morning, put the cap back on and place the â€œhand sanitizerâ€ out for people to use. Theyâ€™ll be so confused when nothing comes out! [1] X Research source If you try this with a pump hand sanitizer, make sure to place the pump top back into the bottle so the glue hardens around it.

steps.title: Unusable Soap Prank
steps.content: Unusable Soap Prank Have a roommate or family member who uses bar soap? Then this is the perfect prank for them! Dry their most-used soap. Then, paint the soap with clear nail polish. The next time they try to use the bar soap, no suds will appear, and theyâ€™ll be utterly confused. [2] X Research source

Move the spider around as if it were really alive for the best reaction. [9] X Research source

steps.content: You Won! Prank Make a loved one think theyâ€™ve won a huge prize with this classic prank. Hide your phone number and disguise your voice.
